extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RandomString()
      Constructs a secure random String generator : with default SecureRandom implementation. that generate String of length 8. that generate String that contain upper case letters, lower case letters and digits.
      RandomString​(int length)
      Constructs a secure random String generator with default SecureRandom implementation and that generate String that contain upper case letters, lower case letters and digits.
      RandomString​(int length, java.lang.String alphabet)
      Constructs a secure random String generator with default SecureRandom implementation.
      RandomString​(int length, java.security.SecureRandom random)
      Constructs a secure random String generator that generate String that contain upper case letters, lower case letters and digits.
      RandomString​(int length, java.security.SecureRandom random, java.lang.String alphabet)
      Constructs a secure random String generator.
      RandomString​(java.lang.String alphabet)
      Constructs a secure random String generator with default SecureRandom implementation and that generate String of length 8.
      RandomString​(java.security.SecureRandom random)
      Constructs a secure random String generator that generate String of length 8 and that contain upper case letters, lower case letters and digits.
      RandomString​(java.security.SecureRandom random, java.lang.String alphabet)
      Constructs a secure random String generator that generate String of length 8.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomString

        public RandomString​(int length,
                    java.security.SecureRandom random,
                    java.lang.String alphabet)
        Constructs a secure random String generator.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of generated strings
        random - The SecureRandom used to generate strings
        alphabet - The characters that can appear in generated strings
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if length is lower to 0
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the length of symbols is lower to 1
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if random is null

      • RandomString

        public RandomString​(int length,
                    java.security.SecureRandom random)
        Constructs a secure random String generator that generate String that contain upper case letters, lower case letters and digits.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of generated strings
        random - The SecureRandom used for generate strings
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if length is lower to 0
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if random is null
        See Also:
        UPPER_CASE_LETTERS, LOWER_CASE_LETTERS, DIGITS

        public RandomString​(int length)
        Constructs a secure random String generator with default SecureRandom implementation and that generate String that contain upper case letters, lower case letters and digits.
        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • RandomString

        public RandomString​(java.security.SecureRandom random,
                    java.lang.String alphabet)
        Constructs a secure random String generator that generate String of length 8.
        Parameters:
        random - The SecureRandom used for generate strings
        alphabet - The characters that can appear in generated strings
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the length of alphabet is lower or equals to 1
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if random is null

      • RandomString

        public RandomString​(java.security.SecureRandom random)

        Parameters:
        random - The SecureRandom used for generate strings
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if random is null

        • with default SecureRandom implementation.
        • that generate String of length 8.
